singleLayout.title: Single Cabinet Optimal Layout
singleLayout.description: Automatically calculate the optimal row and column layout using a single cabinet model within specified wall dimensions

multiCombination.description: Intelligently analyze the best combination of multiple cabinet sizes to achieve perfect wall coverage

oneClick.description: Get calculation results and preview in a single request, reducing network calls and improving efficiency

usageModes.title: Usage Modes Comparison

layoutOnly.title: Layout-Only Mode
layoutOnly.subtitle: Calculate screen layout only, no power/weight data required

fullMode.title: Full Mode
fullMode.subtitle: Complete calculation with power and weight statistics

usageModes.keyPoint1: power and physical are optional parameters, send as needed
usageModes.keyPoint2: No power ‚Üí No powerConsumption in response
usageModes.keyPoint3: No physical ‚Üí No physical in response
usageModes.keyPoint4: Layout calculation (columns, rows, coverage) always returned
usageModes.completeExample: Complete Example: LED Calculator with Optional Parameter Toggle
usageModes.feature1: Users can toggle power/weight data inclusion
usageModes.feature2: Dynamically build request params based on user selection
usageModes.feature3: Display results based on provided parameters
